lab_title: MySQL Error-Based SQL Injection via UpdateXML
lab_description: Learn to exploit MySQL error-based SQL injection using the UpdateXML function to extract critical database information for further compromise.
lab_objectives: Craft a payload using the UpdateXML function
Extract the database name using error-based SQL injection
lab_prerequisites: Using web proxies like Burp Suite
lab_skills_learned: Manipulating MySQL error output with UpdateXML

lab_quick_start.prerequisites: Docker and Docker Compose installed locally.
lab_quick_start.installation: Clone the repo, then run: docker-compose up --build. Visit http://localhost:3206 and start testing the /search.php endpoint.

site.name: QuickPay
